title: Performance issues
body: I can't test the alpha client because it reduces my computer's performance significantly (ingame about 10 fps less than with the current client).

replies.body: We have a plan to help alleviate these problems. In addition to those plans we're also thinking about an option which will close the client when you go into game and reopen it when you're done, but thats still in the idea phase.
Will this fix the issue that when a game begins, you need to alt tab into the game?
